content: is highly recommended to use pins to secure the shape using the tail sew all the way around the ear see the following page for photographs curve into shape and pin to head notice the ears are reversed to keep the curved side near his chin pin ears for best results arms - << in cuff color >> chain 10 and slip_stitch to join chain 1 and single_crochet in the back bump all the way around slip_stitch to join 10 insert green hand into cuff nestle the green hand inside of the first cuff round round 5 - chain 1 single_crochet into 4b and flo of round 4a at the same time continue for 8 more stitches work 1 single_crochet into last single_crochet slip_stitch to join fasten_off even if using the same color it will create a cleaner look for the cuff 10 crochet the pieces together by going through both the cuff and hand round 6 - << using coat color >> attach yarn in any stitch chain 1 single_crochet blo all the way around do not join 10 round 6 in contrasting color attach to the back loop only round 7 - single_crochet decrease single_crochet 8 9 round 8 thru 11 -
